A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Maybe not as good as The Force Awakens\, but still very fun. Some of the humour was out of place for a Star Wars film\, but I did like that there was more humour\, even if it was a bit odd.
The lightsaber battles were excellent\, as were the flying sequences\, and it was great to have Luke Skywalker back.
Some of the story was a bit unnecessary\, as they seemed to be just creating story for characters that they could have skipped (Finn's stuff with the girl\, bleh).
I liked the Rey-Kylo dynamic\, I'm hoping for more moral struggles in the next film.
A good movie\, although maybe a bit long.
Watched at Chinook with Sam\, Priscilla\, Tim\, Amelia\, Keefe\, Jordan\, Ken\, and Irene on December 25\, 2017 (Christmas Day movie with Sam's family).
